title: Enhance Your RAG Application With Advanced SQL Vector Queries
author: Usama Jamil
description: Overcome RAG limitations by creating an AI assistant using MyScale and LangChain to enhance accuracy and efficiency of the data retrieval process.
cntitle: 使用高级 SQL 向量查询增强您的 RAG 应用程序
cndescription: 通过使用 MyScale 和 LangChain 创建 AI 助手来克服 RAG 的限制，以提高数据检索过程的准确性和效率。
